title: A general treatise of the diseases of maids, bigbellied women, child-bed-women, and widows together with the best methods of preventing or curing the same / by J. Pechey ...
author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Pages 19-27 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 33 photographed from Trinity College Library, Dublin copy, and inserted at end.
